ygData.subject: Re: possible cheat... Off topic - Longish
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Why is everyone assuming that the datastream is encrypted?  Within a month of attempting it another group had an everquest *SERVER* emulator that was able
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 19 Aug 1999, kale usi wrote:
> From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
> >As i know, there are already alot of cryptic algorithms exists, which
> >make cryptoanalytical method of cracking fairly ineffective. Of >course,
> >most of them illegal to use without approval of agencies like
Why is everyone assuming that the datastream is encrypted? Within
a month of attempting it another group had an everquest *SERVER* emulator
that was able to have a client walk around the world and see monsters that
they spawned. Surely you don't think they had time to break ANY encoding
and *STILL* be able to analyize the protocol to the point of having a
working server do you?
